about_the_game:
Brief description:

The game offers modern graphics, flexible settings for weak PCs and exciting gameplay in the RTS genre. Fight the enemy on the battlefield 1 on 1, use an innovative support system and build your strategy for victory. Feel the tension of tactical battles and the freedom of graphics settings with Unreal Engine 5.5 .

Detailed description:

"Our game is a unique product in the RTS genre, combining modern graphics with flexible settings for any PC. Developed on the basis of Unreal Engine 5.5, it offers a high-quality visual component optimized for players with weak computers. You can customize the graphics to the smallest detail,

choosing between NVIDIA Ray Tracing, Lumen or SSR technologies for dynamic lighting, and activating Intel XeSS for increased performance.

Two modes await you in the game:

1v1 battle with AI where you will command military forces, capture oil rigs, build bases, create infantry and vehicles to defeat the enemy.

A historical mode with a series of missions inspired by notable events, although not a reenactment of them.

An innovative support system will allow you to order artillery fire, missile strikes or financial aid, which will significantly affect the outcome of the battle.

The game is built from scratch, all mechanics are unique and inspired by the classics of the genre.

Every inch of the battlefield counts here, and your enemy won't go down without a fight. Test your tactical skills by overcoming challenges and achieve victory."

Warning:

Thank you for your interest in our game! We want to emphasize that it is a purely fictional product and has nothing to do with real life. All similarities to real events or persons are coincidental. The game does not promote terrorism in any form and fully condemns violence and any form of aggression.

We aim to create a fun and engaging game that is not intended to offend or offend anyone. Your support and feedback is important to us and we are open to constructive suggestions and criticism. Thank you for understanding!

content_descriptors.notes: Warning! The game contains scenes of violence and blood in large quantities, which may trigger emotional reactions.

detailed_description:
Early Access

The game is in early access to allow players to experience the product at an early stage of development. This decision is based on the need for testing and improving the gameplay experience through your feedback. We aim to use this phase to develop the game together with the community. The further development of the game depends on the support we receive from players. Thank you for your trust and understanding!

Feedback about bugs and errors in the game

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk: HDD SATA-III
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 20 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 TI
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk: SSD M2

name: Ukrainian Shield: Iraq

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk: HDD SATA-III
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk: SSD M2

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos

short_description: Take command in a realistic RTS strategy highlighting Ukraine’s peacekeeping mission in Iraq. Lead your forces, call in powerful support, and complete a series of unique missions.
